DESCRIPTION: Each combat, cards with Turnthirst gain bonus effects as of Turn X.
After used, this relic can't be used again until X passes.
If this relic has not been used for X in a row, pay to get nothing next time it gets used (which doesn't take up usable times for that turn).
Evaded attacks get their damage decreased to 0.
Remove cards from the current combat, which don't enter the #yExhaust pile.
Gain #yRitual at the end of each turn (after #yRitual is triggered).
Remove the leftmost potion, move all the rest of potions 1 slot leftward, and finally set the upcoming potion into the rightmost slot.
